column3: What are you guys doing up
Oh, we wanted to finish the crossword before we went to bed
Hey, do you know a six-letter word for red
Yeah, I think that's wrong, but there's a Connect the Dots in here for you later
Aww, you guys are so cute
All right, I'll see you in the morning
Uhh, we still need a tip
How much more do we need
You guys should probably keep talking; this could take a while
Oh my God, this is a police badge
Why would a cop come in here though
Y'know what actually, could you discover the badge again
I think I can come up with something better than that
Phoebe, I bet somebody's missing that badge
Yeah, I should probably take it back
While I'm at the police station, I could check their Ten Most Wanted lists because my friend Fritzy has been like number 11 forever, so this could be her year
I'm sorry I borrowed it, I was cold
Well uh, it's just that uh, y'know if-if you're gonna be wearing someone's sweatshirt shouldn't it be your boyfriends--and I’m not him
I'm sorry, I'll give it back to you
I mean it's gonna be all smelling like Monica
Are you saying I smell bad
No, you smell like a meadow
The last time Joey went to a meadow, his mother was shot by a hunter
I'm sorry I just wanna make sure that I bought the right couch
I need a couch that says, "Kids welcome here
" But that also says,  "Come here to me
The "Come here to me" is y'know for the ladies
Ross, honey, it's a nice couch
Could you just sign right here please
The delivery charge is almost as much as the couch
Come on, he lives three blocks away
I'll take it myself, thank you
Oh, come on it's only three blocks
And-and, it's not very heavy, try it
You two are really gonna enjoy that couch
Oh yeah, we're uh, yeah we're not together
Something didn't quite add up there
Well you, her, I mean, she's very…y'know
Not that it's any of your business, but we did go out
Come on, I don't really want to be doing this right now
I am carrying a very heavy couch
Not only did we go out, we did it 298 times
A loser you did it with  298 times
You can't put your cigarette out on a tree
Yeah I can, it worked real well
Until I have my next cigarette
Yeah that's right you are so busted
Unless you wanna spend the night in the slammer, you apologize to the tree
I am not going to apologize to a tree
You apologize to the tree right now or I am calling for backup
Ross, didn't you say that there was an elevator in here
Uhh, yes I did but there isn't
There is no more left, left
Oh okay, lift it straight up over your head
Any chance you think the couch looks good there
…so this guy was all  And I'm all, Buffay, Homicide
Phoebe, you were supposed to take that back
I know but I'm having so much fun doing good deeds
Okay, but impersonating a police officer is a serious thing
You could get arrested, right now
All right, yeah, I gotta take it back
Yeah, I didn’t know you guys were going to be here
What is going on with you
You've been acting strange all day
I kinda had a dream,  but I don't want to talk about it
Whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa-whoa-what-what if Martin Luther King had said that
I don’t want to talk about it
You had a dream about a girl that I am seeing
I can't tell you how many times I've dreamt about a girl that he was seeing
Anyway we're talking about your dream
Don't worry, there wasn't any sex in it or anything
I haven't dreamt about her like that since I found out about you two--ish
You were my girlfriend and we were doing the crossword puzzle
Y'know like you guys were doing last night
I'm in love with Monica and I'll be moving out
That doesn’t mean that-that you're in love with me
Like uh, all of the sudden you're jealous because I've become the apartment stud
That kinda sounds like your dream dude
Or, it could mean that-that you saw Chandler and me together and we y'know were being close and stuff and then you just want to have that with someone too
In the dream I did enjoy the closeness
Joey, look, are you attracted to Monica
Right here, right now, are you attracted to her
But that's good that you're not in love with me, because you just want a girlfriend
No, I don't think it's just about just getting a girlfriend
I mean, yeah, I can get a girlfriend
Yeah, we could sit in the chair and do crosswords, but y'know are we ever going to have y'know the closeness like-like you guys have
Well y'know, Monica and I were friends before we started dating
Hey, umm, do you guys have that tape measure
Oh yeah, it's actually in my bedroom
Excuse me, is this your car
Well I don't think it's very nice of you to park here, y'know you're blocking the entrance
Well, it's a problem for me, which means it's a problem for you 'cause I'm a cop
Oh okay, so you're a cop which means you can park anywhere, 'cause I know that 'cause I'm a cop too
So, all right, keep up the good work
So wait, what precinct are you with
Oh, I know a guy in homicide up there
Yeah, in fact I'm undercover right now
Who-who else is in vice up there
Umm, do you know, umm Sipowicz
Don’t try to call him or anything, 'cause he's not there, he's out
His umm, his partner just died
Wow umm, tell Sipowicz I'm real sorry for his loss
Hey by the way, I'm sure Sipowicz is gonna be all right
I heard that kid from Silver Spoons is really good
And where did you find my badge
Joey, would you mind giving me and Ross a hand moving his couch
Oh, I'd love too, but I got acting class
I guess I can blow that off,  for you
Uh, hey, Rach let me ask you something
Uh, I was just over there talking to Monica and Chandler, boy they are really tight
Yeah that's not such a bad situation they got going over there
I'm thinking of getting me one of those
Well, the reason I think Monica and Chandler are so great…
So I asked myself, "Who are my friends
" You and Phoebe, and I saw you first
I'm saying maybe you and I crank it up a notch
Y'know honey, umm, as uh, as flattered as I am that uh, you saw me first, uhh, I just, I-I don't think we should be cranking anything up

Yeah, well, y'know umm… No honey, listen I think it's a great idea to become friends with someone before you date them, but I think the way you do it is y'know you meet someone, become their friend, build a foundation, then you ask them out on a date
Don't hit on your existing friends
Oh, but once you find it, ohh it's so worth the wait
Man, I wish I saw Phoebe first
No-no, you come here to me
Well, I brought the next best thing
The next best thing would be Monica
Y'know, I would be offended, but Monica is freakishly strong, so…
Look, I-I drew a sketch about how we're gonna do it
You certainly think a lot of yourself
I thought you just really, really liked your new couch
Okay, I don't think we can turn anymore
Ross, I don't, I just don't think it's going to fit
Okay, I don't think it's going to pivot anymore
All right, let's uh, let's bring it back down and-and try again
Okay, yeah, I think it's really stuck now
I can't believe that didn't work
I mean, you had a sketch
Oh, y'know, what did you mean when you said pivot
Did you make any new friends
Yeah, yeah, I met this woman
Uhh, well, she's…really good in bed
Joey, I thought you were gonna try to be friends first
Well look, hey, it's all your fault
Well because you didn't give me advice
You gave me a pickup line
As soon as I told her I wanted to y'know, build a foundation and be friends first
I suddenly, through no fault of my own, became irresistible to her
There was three of us for crying out loud
Can you believe I found it on the second floor
Oh my God, Phoebe, are you gonna go to jail
Well, if I'm going down, I'm taking you  with me
That's one to three years minimum
But you'll never make it stick and you know it
Yeah, but I kinda don't have a choice, it's my job
As long as you understand that I'm going to call my lawyer and once he puts you on the stand he'll make you look like a fool
Maybe uh, I don't arrest you today
Maybe I came by and you weren't here
I would love it if I weren't here
Okay, so since umm, you're not going to jail tonight I was wondering if you would like to go to dinner with me
Ever since you flashed my badge at me, I kinda can't stop thinking about you
You're the prettiest, fake undercover whore I've ever seen
I mean, I coulda done it better, but these people keep staring at me
Umm, yeah, I'd like to go out with you officer…
So--ooh, I gotta ask you though
How did you know where to find me
Well you're fingerprints were all over my badge so I just ran it through the computer and this was listed as your last known address so I just checked it out
I gotta tell you, I looked at your record and you've done some pretty weird stuff
So I'll come by in a couple hours and pick you up
And don't worry, I'm not just gonna take you out for donuts
I'd like to return this couch
Did you cut this couch in half
This couch, is cut in half
I would like to exchange it for one that is not cut in half
You're telling me this couch was delivered to you like this
Look, I am a reasonable man
I'll give you store credit in the amount of four dollars
